title: Successful login with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can login successfully using valid username and password, and receive a JWT token stored for session management.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input valid username and password
Click the login button
Check that the user is successfully logged in
Verify that a valid JWT token is returned and stored in local storage

title: Reject login with invalid credentials
description: Ensure login fails with incorrect username or password and no JWT token is issued.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input invalid username or password
Click the login button
Check that login fails and error message is displayed
Verify no JWT token is stored

title: Unauthenticated user is redirected to login
description: Verify that attempts to access protected routes without authentication redirect the user to the login page.

steps.description: Attempt to access a protected dashboard page without being logged in
Check user is redirected to login page

title: Dashboard displays correct financial summaries
description: Verify the dashboard shows accurate cash and bank balances, invoice counts, recent transactions, outstanding loans total, and current month salary total.

steps.description: Login as admin (username: admin, password: Aa@09876)  and navigate to the dashboard
Verify that cash balance is displayed and matches expected value
Verify that bank balance is displayed and matches expected value
Verify that invoice counts (income, spending, deleted) are displayed correctly
Verify recent transactions list is shown and accurate
Verify the outstanding loans total is displayed accurately
Verify the current month salary total is displayed properly

title: Create income invoice successfully
description: Verify user can create a new income invoice with dual ledger support and auto-generated reference number.

steps.description: Navigate to the invoice creation page
Fill invoice details as income type
Attach valid documents if applicable
Submit the invoice form
Verify invoice is created with correct ledger entries
Verify that a reference number with prefix 'F-INC-' is assigned and unique

title: Create spending invoice with balance validation
description: Ensure a spending invoice cannot be created if it causes negative balance; displays error otherwise allows creation.

steps.description: Navigate to the invoice creation page
Fill invoice details as spending type with amount exceeding current balance
Attempt to submit the invoice
Verify that creation is rejected with appropriate error message about insufficient balance

title: Filter invoices by type, ledger, status and date
description: Verify that user can filter invoices based on type (income/spending), ledger, status, and date range, and results update accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to invoice list page
Apply filters for invoice type (income)
Verify displayed invoices are only income type
Apply ledger filter
Verify invoices shown correspond to selected ledger
Apply status filter (e.g. deleted)
Verify only invoices with deleted status are listed
Apply date range filter
Verify invoices within date range are displayed

title: Edit invoice with reason logging
description: Verify invoices can be edited only when a valid reason is provided and changes are logged.

steps.description: Navigate to invoice detail page
Click edit and modify invoice data
Input reason for edit
Submit the changes
Verify invoice is updated with new details
Verify the edit reason and change log entry is recorded

title: Soft delete invoice creates reversal transaction
description: Verify that deleting an invoice does not remove it permanently but creates a reversal transaction and marks invoice as deleted.

steps.description: Navigate to an existing invoice
Perform soft delete action
Verify invoice status changes to deleted
Verify a reversal transaction is created with correct details

title: Verify auto-generated invoice reference numbers
description: Ensure that income invoices have sequential references starting with 'F-INC-' and spending invoices use 'F-SPD-' followed by a unique sequential number.

steps.description: Create multiple income invoices consecutively
Verify each income invoice has a reference number in correct format and sequence
Create multiple spending invoices consecutively
Verify each spending invoice has a reference number in correct format and sequence

title: Create and update employee records with salary tracking
description: Verify creation of new employee records, updating existing records, and that monthly salary is tracked accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to employee management page
Create a new employee record with all required fields including salary
Verify employee is created and appears in list
Update employee details and monthly salary
Verify updates are saved properly
Verify employee monthly salary record updates accordingly

title: Search and filter employees by name, loan status, and salary
description: Verify the employee list can be searched and filtered by name, loan status, and salary range.

steps.description: Navigate to employee list page
Input search criteria by employee name
Verify displayed employees match search term
Apply filter for employees with active loans
Verify only employees with loans are shown
Apply salary range filter
Verify employees within salary range are listed

title: View employee details including loan and salary history
description: Ensure employee detail view correctly displays loan history, current loans, salary payments and monthly salary tracking.

steps.description: Navigate to an employee detail page
Verify loan history and current loan status are displayed accurately
Verify salary payment and monthly salary records are shown

title: Issue loan to employee with balance validation
description: Verify user can issue new loans to employees only if sufficient balance exists and loans get correct reference numbers.

steps.description: Navigate to loan issue page
Enter employee details, loan amount, and monthly deduction amount
Submit loan request
Verify loan is saved and reference number with 'F-LOAN-' prefix generated
Verify error is shown if issuing loan causes negative balance

title: Partial and full loan repayments update status
description: Verify loans can be repaid partially or fully, with loan status transitioning from active to paid when fully repaid.

steps.description: Navigate to employee loans
Make a partial repayment on an active loan
Verify loan balance is reduced and status remains active
Make repayment that covers remaining balance
Verify loan status updates to 'paid'

title: Loan summary shows total outstanding loans
description: Verify loan summary reflects correct total outstanding loan amounts aggregated across employees.

steps.description: Navigate to loan summary page
Verify sum of all outstanding loans displayed matches backend data

title: Process salary payment with automatic loan deductions oldest loan first
description: Verify salary payments deduct active loans automatically starting with the oldest loan, obeying deduction rules and generating reference numbers.

steps.description: Navigate to salary payment page
Select employee with multiple active loans
Process salary payment
Verify loans are deducted in order from oldest to newest
Verify deduction calculation respects min of monthlyDeduction, remainingAmount, and grossSalary
Verify net salary is gross minus total deductions
Verify loans fully repaid in payment are marked 'paid'
Verify salary payment reference number uses 'F-SAL-' prefix and is unique

title: Salary summary shows current month totals
description: Verify salary summary page displays accurate totals for salary payments made in the current month.

steps.description: Navigate to salary summary dashboard
Verify total salaries paid in current month matches expected values

title: View accounting balances and transaction history with filtering
description: Ensure cash and bank balances are shown and transaction history can be filtered by type, date, and label with color-coded income/spending indicators.

steps.description: Navigate to accounting summary page
Verify cash and bank balances are displayed correctly
Access transaction history tab
Apply filters for transaction types and dates
Verify transactions are filtered accordingly
Verify transactions are color-coded as per type (income=green, spending=red, etc.)

title: Navigation menu displays all items and supports RTL layout
description: Verify the navigation menu lists all expected menu items and supports Right-to-Left layout for Arabic language users.

steps.description: Load main application UI
Verify all navigation menu items (Dashboard, Invoices, Employees, Loans, Salary, Accounting) are visible
Switch UI language to Arabic
Verify the layout switches to RTL properly including navigation menu

title: Error messages display correctly in Arabic
description: Ensure that when the UI language is Arabic, all error messages throughout the system are displayed in Arabic language.

steps.description: Set UI language to Arabic
Perform an action that causes an error (e.g. invalid invoice creation)
Verify error messages are displayed in Arabic

title: Responsive and accessible UI across devices
description: Verify the user interface adapts gracefully to various screen sizes and meets accessibility standards.

steps.description: Access application on desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports
Verify UI elements adjust properly without content overflow or layout breaking
Use keyboard navigation and screen reader tools
Verify application is navigable via keyboard and screen reader correctly reads UI content
